FuncDef: This command configures of an egress per-subscriber bandwidth limit for the combined retransmission and Fast Channel Change (FCC) replies for requests received directed to the IP address. If the bandwidth for a request will exceed the bandwidth limit, the request is logged and dropped.

ParaDef.Info: The per-subscriber egress bandwidth limit for retransmission and FCC packets in kilobits per second expressed as an integer indicates infinity or no limit. Values-1 to 4294967295 kb/s.
